English 1: English 1 NEW PUBLIC SPACE

A pedestrianization in the heart of the Plateau-Mont-Royal.

author

Cynthia Tarlao and Edda Bild

WHEN

May 5, 2021

The project removed traffic noise and created a new pedestrian walkway / seating area in a space where previously there was only a road.It also created a new neighborhood space of meeting, often used by residents and visitors alike, who appreciate the greenery, increased sense of safety due to lack of cars, and the ‘quieter’ soundscape where cars are only audible in the distance.

The project removed traffic noise and created a new pedestrian walkway / seating area in a space where previously there was only a road.It also created a new neighborhood space of meeting, often used by residents and visitors alike, who appreciate the greenery, increased sense of safety due to lack of cars, and the ‘quieter’ soundscape where cars are only audible in the distance.



For more information (French only): https://ouq.qc.ca/activite/les-journees-de-lenvironnement-sonore-2021/
